flawed_nl_solution:
In round one, Jeff completed 16 - 1 = <<16-1=19>>19.
In round two, Jeff completed 16 - 3 = <<16-3=13>>13.
In round three, Jeff completed 16 + 4 = <<16+4=20>>20.
In round four, Jeff completed 16 / 2 = <<16/2=8>>8.
Jeff completed 19 + 13 + 20 + 8 = <<19+13+20+8=60>>60 skips in total.
Jeff skipped an average of 60 / 4 = <<60/4=15>>15 skips per round.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
